Class UserFileManager

java.lang.Object
UserFileManager
public class UserFileManager extends Object
Utility class for saving and loading User objects from a text file.

Each line in users.txt contains user data separated by |: 

 username|passwordHash|customerId|role
Lines starting with # are ignored as comments. author Ilinca Rusescu

  • Method Details

    • saveUsers

      public static void saveUsers(List<User> users)
      Saves all User objects to the users.txt file.

      The file is overwritten on each save. For clarity, a commented header line is added at the top of the file.

      Parameters:
      users - list of users to save (ignored if empty or null)

    • loadUsers

      public static List<User> loadUsers()
      Loads all users from users.txt.

      Each valid line must contain four fields: 

       username|passwordHash|customerId|role
      Invalid or malformed lines are skipped automatically.
      Returns:
      a list of reconstructed User objects; an empty list if the file does not exist

    • usernameExists

      public static boolean usernameExists(List<User> users, String username)
